bylaws

These are the rules that govern the James River Outdoor Coalition

View the Project on GitHub

  1. Treasurer. The Treasurer shall collect, have custody of and be responsible for all funds of the Coalition, shall keep an accurate account of such funds, shall pay all just bills when due and funds are available, and shall submit a financial report at the end of each year. All checks, drafts, notices and orders for the payment of money issued by the Coalition and other similar documents requiring the signature of the Coalition shall be signed by the Treasurer by such other person or persons, if any, as the Board of Directors may from time to time designate.

This project is maintained by james-river-outdoor-coalition
